column2: "Hello, how are you? Lisa just finished a mission, so she's in the mood for talking."
"Guns are really great, wouldn't you agree?"
"They make enemies dance around before they drop down dead, and they do it without ever even touching them... Isn't that amazing?"
"They make Lisa feel like she's in control of everything... Just talking about them has gotten Lisa wanting to shoot some more."
"Okay, Lisa is off, see you later."
